title: Equitas Small Finance Bank's board approves allotment of 10.26 crore equity shares to Qualified Institutional - CNBCTV18
content: Equitas Small Finance Bank's board approves allotment of 10.26 crore equity shares to Qualified Institutional  CNBCTV18
description: The bank added that this reflects a discount of Rs 2.81, or 4.98 percent, on the floor price of Rs 56.40 per equity share, aggregating to nearly Rs 5,500 crore  only pursuant to the issue.
